verses.verse: Then we turned, <WH6437> and went <WH5927> up the way <WH1870> to Bashan: <WH1316> and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> came <WH3318> out against <WH7125> us, he and all <WH3605> his people, <WH5971> to battle <WH4421> at Edrei. <WH154>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, Fear <WH3372> him not: for I will deliver <WH5414> him, and all <WH3605> his people, <WH5971> and his land, <WH776> into your hand; <WH3027> and you shall do <WH6213> to him as you did <WH6213> to Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> which <WH834> dwelled <WH3427> at Heshbon. <WH2809>

So the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> delivered <WH5414> into our hands <WH3027> Og <WH5747> also, <WH1571> the king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> and all <WH3605> his people: <WH5971> and we smote <WH5221> him until <WH5704> none <WH1115> was left <WH7604> to him remaining. <WH8300>

And we took <WH3920> all <WH3605> his cities <WH5892> at that time, <WH6256> there was not a city <WH7151> which <WH834> we took <WH3947> not from them, three score <WH8346> cities, <WH5892> all <WH3605> the region <WH2256> of Argob, <WH709> the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan. <WH1316>

All <WH3605> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> were fenced <WH1219> with high <WH1364> walls, <WH2346> gates, <WH1817> and bars; <WH1280> beside <WH905> unwalled <WH6519> towns <WH5892> a great <WH3966> many. <WH7227>

And we utterly destroyed <WH2763> them, as we did <WH6213> to Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> utterly destroying <WH2763> the men, <WH4962> women, <WH802> and children, <WH2945> of every <WH3605> city. <WH5892>
But all <WH3605> the cattle, <WH929> and the spoil <WH7998> of the cities, <WH5892> we took for a prey <WH962> to ourselves.

And we took <WH3947> at that time <WH6256> out of the hand <WH3027> of the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567> the land <WH776> that was on <WH5921> this side <WH5676> Jordan, <WH3383> from the river <WH5158> of Arnon <WH769> to mount <WH2022> Hermon; <WH2768>
(Which Hermon <WH2768> the Sidonians <WH6722> call <WH7121> Sirion; <WH8303> and the Amorites <WH567> call <WH7121> it Shenir; <WH8149>)

All <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of the plain, <WH4334> and all <WH3605> Gilead, <WH1568> and all <WH3605> Bashan, <WH1316> to Salchah <WH5548> and Edrei, <WH154> cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan. <WH1316>

For only <WH7535> Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> remained <WH7604> of the remnant <WH3499> of giants; <WH7497> behold <WH2009>his bedstead <WH6210> was a bedstead <WH6210> of iron; <WH1270> is it not in Rabbath <WH7237> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon? <WH5983> nine <WH8672> cubits <WH520> was the length <WH753> thereof, and four <WH702> cubits <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> of it, after the cubit <WH520> of a man. <WH376>

And this <WH2063> land, <WH776> which we possessed <WH3423> at that time, <WH6256> from Aroer, <WH6177> which <WH834> is by the river <WH5158> Arnon, <WH769> and half <WH2677> mount <WH2022> Gilead, <WH1568> and the cities <WH5892> thereof, gave <WH5414> I to the Reubenites <WH7206> and to the Gadites. <WH1425>

And the rest <WH3499> of Gilead, <WH1568> and all <WH3605> Bashan, <WH1316> being the kingdom <WH4467> of Og, <WH5747> gave <WH5414> I to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh; <WH4519> all <WH3605> the region <WH2256> of Argob, <WH709> with all <WH3605> Bashan, <WH1316> which <WH1931> was called <WH7121> the land <WH776> of giants. <WH7497>

Jair <WH2971> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> took <WH3947> all <WH3605> the country <WH2256> of Argob <WH709> to the coasts <WH1366> of Geshuri <WH1651> and Maachathi; <WH4602> and called <WH7121> them after <WH5921> his own name, <WH8034> Bashanhavothjair, <WH1316> <WH2334> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
And I gave <WH5414> Gilead <WH1568> to Machir. <WH4353>

And to the Reubenites <WH7206> and to the Gadites <WH1425> I gave <WH5414> from Gilead <WH1568> even to the river <WH5158> Arnon <WH769> half <WH8432> the valley, <WH5158> and the border <WH1366> even to the river <WH5158> Jabbok, <WH2999> which is the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983>

The plain <WH6160> also, and Jordan, <WH3383> and the coast <WH1366> thereof, from Chinnereth <WH3672> even to the sea <WH3220> of the plain, <WH6160> even the salt <WH4417> sea, <WH3220> under <WH8478> Ashdothpisgah <WH798> <WH6449> eastward. <WH4217>

And I commanded <WH6680> you at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559> The LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has given <WH5414> you this <WH2063> land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> it: you shall pass <WH5674> over <WH5674> armed <WH2502> before <WH6440> your brothers <WH251> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> all <WH3605> that are meet <WH1121> for the war. <WH2428>

But your wives, <WH802> and your little <WH2945> ones, and your cattle, <WH4735> (for I know <WH3045> that you have much <WH7227> cattle, <WH4735>) shall abide <WH3427> in your cities <WH5892> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> you;

Until <WH5704> the LORD <WH3068> have given rest <WH5117> to your brothers, <WH251> as well as to you, and until they also <WH1571> possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has given <WH5414> them beyond <WH5676> Jordan: <WH3383> and then shall you return <WH7725> every man <WH376> to his possession, <WH3425> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> you.

And I commanded <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091> at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559> Your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> all <WH3605> that the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has done <WH6213> to these <WH428> two <WH8147> kings: <WH4428> so <WH3651> shall the LORD <WH3068> do <WH6213> to all <WH3605> the kingdoms <WH4467> where <WH834> <WH8033> you pass. <WH5674>
You shall not fear <WH3372> them: for the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> he shall fight <WH3898> for you.
And I sought <WH2603> the LORD <WH3068> at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559>

O Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> you have begun <WH2490> to show <WH7200> your servant <WH5650> your greatness, <WH1433> and your mighty <WH2389> hand: <WH3027> for what <WH4310> God <WH410> is there in heaven <WH8064> or in earth, <WH776> that can do <WH6213> according to your works, <WH4639> and according to your might? <WH1369>

I pray <WH4994> you, let me go <WH5674> over, <WH5674> and see <WH7200> the good <WH2896> land <WH776> that is beyond <WH5676> Jordan, <WH3383> that goodly <WH2896> mountain, <WH2022> and Lebanon. <WH3844>

But the LORD <WH3068> was wroth <WH5674> with me for your sakes, <WH4616> and would not hear <WH8085> me: and the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, Let it suffice <WH7227> you; speak <WH1696> no <WH408> more <WH5750> to me of this <WH2088> matter. <WH1697>

Get <WH5927> you up into the top <WH7218> of Pisgah, <WH6449> and lift <WH5375> up your eyes <WH5869> westward, <WH3220> and northward, <WH6828> and southward, <WH8486> and eastward, <WH4217> and behold <WH7200> it with your eyes: <WH5869> for you shall not go <WH5674> over <WH5674> this <WH2088> Jordan. <WH3383>

But charge <WH6680> Joshua, <WH3091> and encourage <WH2388> him, and strengthen <WH553> him: for he shall go <WH5674> over <WH5674> before <WH6440> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> and he shall cause them to inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776> which <WH834> you shall see. <WH7200>
So we stayed <WH3427> in the valley <WH1516> over <WH4136> against <WH4136> Bethpeor. <WH1047>
